name: Colour Match (Tom Renkema)
description:
This is a School Project

This Prototype Is Fully Working.

This game is made as application for my school. Can you beat every level?

Story

Asteroids are flying everywhere! It’s up to the space crew to collect all positive asteroids and return to the space station safely before running out of fuel!

Controls

Steering in Browser: A & D

Created by Tom Renkema.
